job.title: Sr. RF Design Engineer - Aerospace
job.description:
If you are a Sr. RF Design Engineer with experience, please read on!
What You Will Be Doing
Design, Prototyping and Validation of RF Subsystems from concept, analysis, part selection, PCB layout and board bring-up
Link budget analysis
Perform simulations using HFSS or AWR/ADS
Electrical Engineering, Embedded Software development
If you have mixed-signal experience in Software-Defined Radios, this is a huge plus!
What You Need for this Position
Strong understanding of RF fundamentals
PCB layout using Altium or other design software
Link Budget Analysis
RF Design
Circuit Design
PCB Layout
PCB Design
GPS
Altium
Simulation
AWR/ADS
HFSS
So, if you are a Sr. RF Design Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Richard.Marion@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : RM2-1635332 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Richard Marion - Recruiting Manager - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
